<js>
var verify=/Just a moment/.test(src);
if(verify){
	cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
	var x=java.get("url");
	s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证").body();
	result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
		result;
</js>
